com.nagarro.imageutility.dao

Interface ImgMgmtUtilityDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImgMgmtUtilityDaoImpl

    public interface ImgMgmtUtilityDao
    The Interface ImgMgmtUtilityDao.It defines all the function which is related to database Image management and server access those database with help of these functions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getImageStream(int imageId)
      Gets the image stream and send it to the servlet for showing the image in the browser.
      long getTableDataCount(int userId)
      Gets the table data count to check the number of entry in the table at the present so that new entry can be made easily.
      double getTotalImgSize(int userId)
      Gets the total img size to get the total image in MB uploaded in the database.
      java.util.List getUserImageData(int userId)
      Gets the user image data.It gives the images for each user after the successful login of the user
      void insertImage(ImageDetail imageDetails)
      Insert image will insert the image into the database in the form of byte stream and also insert image properties like size name etc.
      boolean isImageDeleted(int imageId)
      Checks if is image deleted from the database or not.
      boolean isImageEdited(int imageId, java.lang.String editName)
      Checks if is image edited from the database after client click or not.
